        Parameters:

        appKey - Your APP Key from zoom.us
        appSecret - Your APP Secret from zoom.us
        listener - Listener for initialize result

      • initialize

        public void initialize(android.content.Context context,
                       java.lang.String appKey,
                       java.lang.String appSecret,
                       boolean autoRetryVerifyApp,
                       ZoomSDKInitializeListener listener)
        Initialize ZoomSDK
        Parameters:
        context - Android context
        appKey - Your APP Key from zoom.us
        appSecret - Your APP Secret from zoom.us
        autoRetryVerifyApp - If it is true, Zoom SDK will retry to call verifyApp automatically if failed because of network issue. Else user needs to call verifyApp manually after initialize failed.
        listener - Listener for initialize result

      • initialize

        public void initialize(android.content.Context context,
                       java.lang.String appKey,
                       java.lang.String appSecret,
                       java.lang.String domain,
                       ZoomSDKInitializeListener listener)
        Initialize ZoomSDK
        Parameters:
        context - Android context
        appKey - Your APP Key from zoom.us
        appSecret - Your APP Secret from zoom.us
        domain - Zoom site domain name. Default value is zoom.us
        listener - Listener for initialize result

      • initialize

        public void initialize(android.content.Context context,
                       java.lang.String appKey,
                       java.lang.String appSecret,
                       java.lang.String domain,
                       boolean autoRetryVerifyApp,
                       ZoomSDKInitializeListener listener)
        Initialize ZoomSDK
        Parameters:
        context - Android context
        appKey - Your APP Key from zoom.us
        appSecret - Your APP Secret from zoom.us
        domain - Zoom site domain name. Default value is zoom.us
        autoRetryVerifyApp - If it is true, Zoom SDK will retry to call verifyApp automatically if failed because of network issue. Else user needs to call verifyApp manually after initialize failed.
        listener - Listener for initialize result

      • getVersion

        public java.lang.String getVersion(android.content.Context context)

      • isDeviceSupported

        public boolean isDeviceSupported(android.content.Context context)

      • verifyApp

        public void verifyApp(java.lang.String appKey,
                      java.lang.String appSecret,
                      boolean autoRetryVerifyApp)
        Verify the application. The application must be verified before it is able to connect to a Zoom meeting. This method will be called automatically on initialize being called.
        Parameters:
        appKey - Your APP Key from zoom.us
        appSecret - Your APP Secret from zoom.us
        autoRetryVerifyApp - If it is true, Zoom SDK will retry to call verifyApp automatically if failed because of network issue. Else user needs to call verifyApp manually after initialize failed.

      • isInitialized

        public boolean isInitialized()
        Check if ZoomSDK has been initialized
        Returns:
        true if it is initialized

      • loginWithZoom

        public int loginWithZoom(java.lang.String email,
                         java.lang.String password)
        Login Zoom SDK with work email account. This method is optional, if you do not have work email account in Zoom, just ignore it.
        Parameters:
        email - login email account.
        password - login password.
        Returns:
        result login zoom error code in ZoomApiError

      • loginWithSSOToken

        public int loginWithSSOToken(java.lang.String ssoToken)
        Login Zoom SDK with SSO token.
        Parameters:
        ssoToken - SSO token
        Returns:
        result login zoom error code in ZoomApiError

      • logoutZoom

        public boolean logoutZoom()
        Logout Zoom SDK. This method is optional, if you do not have work email/sso account in Zoom, just ignore it
        Returns:
        true, if user can logout.

      • isLoggedIn

        public boolean isLoggedIn()
        Check if Zoom user is logged in. This method is optional, if you do not have work email account in Zoom, just ignore it
        Returns:
        true, if user is logged.

      • tryAutoLoginZoom

        public int tryAutoLoginZoom()
        Auto login Zoom SDK with local zoom/sso token. This method is optional, if you do not have work email/sso account in Zoom, just ignore it
        Returns:
        result login zoom errorcode in ZoomApiError

      • setDomain

        public void setDomain(java.lang.String domain)
        Set Zoom site domain name
        Parameters:
        domain - The Zoom site domain name to set. Default value is zoom.us.

        Get Zoom site domain name
        Returns:

      • setShowProxyServerDialogImmediatelyIfNeeded

        public void setShowProxyServerDialogImmediatelyIfNeeded(boolean show)
        Set Zoom Sdk if showing proxy server setting dialog immediately or delaying this action
        Parameters:
        show - if true means showing proxy server dialog immediately if needed. if false means not showing this Dialog before setting this interface as true.

      • setDropBoxAppKeyPair

        @Deprecated
public boolean setDropBoxAppKeyPair(android.content.Context context,
                                                 java.lang.String appKey,
                                                 java.lang.String appSecret)
        Deprecated. 
        DropBox App key pair must be set to enable "Share Dropbox". You need also to declare Dropbox AuthActivity in the AndroidManifest.xml as follows, and replace {YourAppKey} with the appKey: <activity android:name="com.dropbox.core.android.AuthActivity" android:configChanges="orientation|keyboard|screenSize|smallestScreenSize|layoutDirection|screenLayout|keyboardHidden|uiMode" android:theme="@style/ZMTheme.SubWindow" android:launchMode="singleTask" > <intent-filter> <!-- Change this to be db- followed by your app key --> <data android:scheme="db-{YourAppKey}" /> <action android:name="android.intent.action.VIEW" /> <category android:name="android.intent.category.BROWSABLE" /> <category android:name="android.intent.category.DEFAULT" /> </intent-filter> </activity> Add follow dependency: compile 'com.dropbox.core:dropbox-core-sdk:3.0.5' compile 'com.squareup.okhttp3:okhttp:3.5.0' You can register your application on DropBox and get your app key pair from: https://www.dropbox.com/developers/apps
        Parameters:
        context - Context to use
        appKey - Dropbox app key
        appSecret - Dropbox app secret
        Returns:
        success or not

      • setOneDriveClientId

        @Deprecated
public boolean setOneDriveClientId(android.content.Context context,
                                                java.lang.String clientId)
        Deprecated. 
        OneDrive client ID must be set to enable "Share OneDrive". You can register your application on Microsoft OneDrive and get your client ID from: http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?LinkId=193157
        Parameters:
        context - Context to use
        clientId - OneDrive app client id
        Returns:
        success or not

      • setBoxAppKeyPair

        @Deprecated
public boolean setBoxAppKeyPair(android.content.Context context,
                                             java.lang.String appKey,
                                             java.lang.String appSecret)
        Deprecated. 
        Box App key pair must be set to enable "Share Box". You need also to download Box Android library v2 and Box Java library from https://developers.box.com. Add this libraries to your project's dependency. Declare Box OAuthActivity in the AndroidManifest.xml as follows: <activity android:name="com.box.boxandroidlibv2.activities.OAuthActivity" /> You can register your application on Box and get your app key pair from: https://developers.box.com
        Parameters:
        context - Context to use
        appKey - Box app key
        appSecret - Box app secret
        Returns:
        success or not

      • setGoogleDriveInfo

        @Deprecated
public boolean setGoogleDriveInfo(android.content.Context context,
                                               java.lang.String clientId,
                                               java.lang.String redirectURL)
        Deprecated. 
        Google Drive client ID must be set to enable "Share Google Drive". As Google will no longer allow OAuth requests to Google in embedded browsers known as "web-views", user need to auth google in device browser From: https://developers.googleblog.com/2016/08/modernizing-oauth-interactions-in-native-apps.html To enbale share google drive in meeting, please see section : Enable share with google drive in help doc. You can register your application on Google API console and get your android client ID from: https://code.google.com/apis/console
        Parameters:
        context - Context to use
        clientId - Your android application client id
        redirectURL - Your android application redirect url(Like:com.example.app:/oauth2redirect com.example.app is client id android package name)
        Returns:
        api call success or not

      • getMeetingService

        public MeetingService getMeetingService()
        Get MeetingService instance
        Returns:
        The shared instance of MeetingService. Return null if the SDK has not been initialized successfully.

      • getPreMeetingService

        public PreMeetingService getPreMeetingService()
        Get PreMeetingService instance
        Returns:
        The shared instance of PreMeetingService. Return null if the SDK has not been initialized successfully or User not login.

      • getInMeetingService

        public InMeetingService getInMeetingService()
        Get InMeetingService instance
        Returns:
        The shared instance of InMeetingService. Return null if no meeting is running.

      • getMeetingSettingsHelper

        public MeetingSettingsHelper getMeetingSettingsHelper()
        Get MeetingSettingsHelper instance
        Returns:
        The shared instance of MeetingSettingsHelper. Return null if the SDK has not been initialized successfully.
